review: The fire stick was a great  investment for me and a great gift for my family. Love the setup tutorial as well as the menu.
author: Terry James

review: Everything I expected and more.  My entire family is addicted, a must have for any prime member and you cannot beat the price.
author: Andy Schneiter

review: Responds slowly at times. No HBO GO service. ShowtimeAnytime is a pain in the butt to set up through the device (my computer isn't in the same room, and ShowtimeAnytime's website doesn't have the same interface via mobile, so I can't authorize the Fire TV Stick when I remember I want to watch Showtime). Recently the device disconnected from my WiFi and refused to reconnect. I had to reboot the device by unplugging it from its power source and the TV.I am underwhelmed by this device.
author: Island Cyclist

review: I love it. It works great and provides the entertainment I need!
author: Brittany
